Package stocker.view

Class ChartPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • stocker.view.ChartPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class ChartPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A specialized JPanel to draw charts within the Stocker application.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChartPanel

        public ChartPanel​(StockerChart parent,
                  ChartWatchItem w,
                  EChartType chartType)
        Construct a new ChartPanel using the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent window (a StockerChart) of this panel
        w - the ChartWatchItem to be drawn on this panel. Can later be changed with setData(ChartWatchItem)
        chartType - the EChartType of this chart. May be null, then the default chart type will be used. Can be changed later by using switchChartType(EChartType)

    • Method Detail

      • setData

        public void setData​(ChartWatchItem w)
        Set this panel to show the data within the provided ChartWatchItem. Overrides the previously set data.
        Parameters:
        w - the ChartWatchItem to be drawn on this panel

      • setLatestData

        public void setLatestData​(double close,
                          double low,
                          double high)
        Sets an update for the data of the latest candle. Only requires close, low and high values as the time and the open value do not change once a candle has been created.
        Parameters:
        close - update for the latest candle's close value
        low - update for the latest candle's low value
        high - update for the latest candle's high value

      • switchChartType

        public void switchChartType​(EChartType type)
        Switch the chart type drawn on this panel to the provided type.
        Parameters:
        type - the EChartType to be drawn on this panel

      • getChartType

        public EChartType getChartType()
        Get the chart type that is currently drawn on this panel.
        Returns:
        the EChartType that is currently set

      • setCandleScheme

        public void setCandleScheme​(ECandleScheme scheme)
        Set this panel's candle scheme to the given value
        Parameters:
        scheme - the ECandleScheme to be set

      • setAlarmColor

        public void setAlarmColor​(java.awt.Color c)
        Set this panel's alarm color to the given value.
        Parameters:
        c - the Color to be set

      • paintImage

        public void paintImage()
        Paints the buffer image for this panel. This method needs to be called for a data change to become visible (calling Component.repaint() or paintComponent(Graphics) is not sufficient as this will only repaint the buffered image). All actual painting is done here into the buffer image (except for the crosslines, which are drawn in paintComponent(Graphics) on top of the image, and except for the loading / error messages which might already be required before the panel is initialized. This method requires the panel to be fully initialized (if it is not, it will do nothing).

      • paintComponent

        protected void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Calls JPanel's paintComponent(Graphics g) method and, if this panel is intialized, draws the buffered image plus the crosslines if necessary. If the panel is not yet initalized, an appropriate message will be drawn.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • setSizeReferenceParameters

        public void setSizeReferenceParameters()
        Sets the reference width and height of this panel according to the size of the window, and triggers the re-calculation of all scales values (which are based to the reference size).

      • calculateScaledValues

        public void calculateScaledValues()
        Calculates the scaled values for the candle data to be painted. Scales from the data coordinate system to the panel reference system with size (xref, yref) = this.getSize().

      • calculateScaledIndicators

        public void calculateScaledIndicators()
        Calculates the scaled values for the indicator data to be painted. Scales from the data coordinate system to the panel reference system with size (xref, yref) = this.getSize().

      • calculateScaledAlarms

        public void calculateScaledAlarms()
        Calculates the scaled values for the alarms to be painted. Scales from the data coordinate system to the panel reference system with size (xref, yref) = this.getSize().

      • inverseCoordinateLookup

        public double[] inverseCoordinateLookup​(int x,
                                        int y)
        Get data coordinate values from panel coordinate values (inverse coordinate lookup).
        Parameters:
        x - the queried x coordinate of the panel
        y - the queried y coordinate of the panel
        Returns:
        array containing the x and y coordinates in the data coordinate frame

      • getLastPrice

        public double getLastPrice()
        Get the last closing price from the data drawn on this panel.
        Returns:
        the close value of the last candle associated with this panel

      • setMousePos

        public void setMousePos​(int x,
                        int y)
        Report the mouse pointer position within this panel and trigger repainting of the crosslines at the new position. The mouse position should be updated any time the mouse pointer has moved, as long as it is within the chart.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the mouse pointer
        y - the y position of the mouse pointer
